docs.title: My Documents
docs.subtitle: Manage your private files for the AI assistant.
docs.upload_subtitle: Drag your PDF here or click to browse
docs.privacy_notice: Your documents are processed securely and are only accessible by you and the AI assistant.
docs.empty_hint: Upload PDFs so the AI can help you with your specific procedures.
docs.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this document?

legal.privacy_content: At Legal & Halal Assistant, we protect your personal data. When you upload your documents, they are processed using encryption and only used to provide AI assistance during your active session. We do not sell or share your data with third parties. We comply with Spanish GDPR regulations.
legal.cookies_content: We use essential cookies to keep your session active and remember your preferred language. We do not use third-party advertising tracking cookies.

procedures.title: Comprehensive Guide to
procedures.subtitle: We simplify Spanish bureaucracy so you can focus on your new life. Updated information on immigration, nationality, and rights.
procedures.residency_desc: Everything about NIE, TIE, Social, Labor and Family Rooting. We guide you every step.
procedures.residency_q1: How do I get social rooting?
procedures.nationality_desc: CCSE/DELE exams, residency deadlines and online submission.
procedures.nationality_q1: How many years do I need for nationality?
procedures.nationality_q2: What is the CCSE exam like?
procedures.work_desc: Self-employment, employment, highly qualified professionals and digital nomads.
procedures.work_q2: Can I work with my student residence?
procedures.work_q3: Changing from stay to work permit
procedures.asylum_desc: Asylum, subsidiary protection and humanitarian reasons.
procedures.asylum_q1: How do I request an asylum appointment?
procedures.doc_banner_title: Did you receive a letter from the Immigration Office?
procedures.doc_banner_subtitle: Don't worry about technical language. Upload it now and <1>STARK will analyze it for you</1> in seconds.
procedures.only_pdf_jpg_png: Only PDF, JPG or PNG files are allowed
procedures.login_required: Please log in to analyze your documents.

halal.title: Your Guide to
halal.subtitle: We help you maintain your values and feel at home. Practical information about lifestyle, food, and cultural coexistence.
halal.food_desc: Guide to additives, certification seals, and supermarket tips in Europe.
halal.food_q2: How to recognize the Halal Institute seal?
halal.food_q3: Is E120 allowed in the Halal diet?
halal.food_q4: Tips for buying Halal meat in Spain
halal.culture_desc: Understand local customs, greetings, and holidays for better integration.
halal.culture_q1: How to greet respectfully in Spain?
halal.community_desc: Information about cultural centers, mosques, and support associations.
halal.community_q1: Where are mosques in my city?
halal.experts_title: Questions about a product or custom?
halal.experts_desc: STARK is trained to answer any question about Halal compatibility or social protocol in Spain. Don't stay in doubt.
halal.testimonial: "STARK helped me understand why my neighbors greeted in a certain way and how to ask for time off for Eid at work. Now I feel much more integrated."

housing.title: Protection and Guide for your
housing.subtitle: Don't be fooled by abusive contracts. We help you understand housing law, verify your rights, and secure your deposit.
housing.contracts_desc: Primary residence vs. seasonal. Know your rights under the Urban Lease Act (LAU).
housing.contracts_q1: What is the minimum duration of a rental contract?
housing.contracts_q2: Difference between seasonal and primary residence contract
housing.contracts_q3: Can I leave the apartment before 6 months?
housing.contracts_q4: What is the automatic contract extension?
housing.deposits_desc: Everything about the legal deposit, additional guarantees, and who should pay agency fees.
housing.deposits_q1: How many months of deposit are mandatory?
housing.deposits_q2: Who pays the real estate agency under the new law?
housing.deposits_q3: How to recover my deposit if they don't return it?
housing.deposits_q4: Can the landlord ask me for 6 months of deposit?
housing.rights_desc: Repairs, utilities, and protection against evictions or other abuses.
housing.rights_q1: Who pays for boiler or appliance repairs?
housing.rights_q2: Can the landlord enter my home without permission?
housing.rights_q3: What to do if they want to raise rent suddenly?
housing.verify_title: Are you about to sign a new contract?
housing.verify_desc: Upload your contract draft now. STARK will analyze if it has abusive clauses, if the deposit is legal, and if it complies with the 2023 Housing Law.
